trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una primitiva del controllo che gestisce il posizionamento e il ridimensionamento di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> controllo e due <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> i controlli che consentono di impostare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo di traccia non è presente un predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: Il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>viene implementato come parte di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: La traccia è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>controllo e due <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>i controlli che vengono utilizzati per modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>proprietà del controllo di avanzamento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente mostra una traccia in un dispositivo di scorrimento.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Una traccia in un dispositivo di scorrimento**![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") nella tabella seguente mostra le proprietà della traccia e il corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>proprietà che vengono automaticamente associate.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Quando delle proprietà viene modificato, cambia anche la proprietà associata.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Tenere traccia delle proprietà | proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| La tabella seguente mostra le proprietà della traccia e i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>proprietà a cui vengono associate quando una traccia fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo e le proprietà della traccia non sono impostate in modo esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Tenere traccia delle proprietà | proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| La tabella seguente mostra le proprietà della traccia e i corrispondenti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>proprietà a cui vengono associate quando una traccia fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo e le proprietà della traccia non sono impostate in modo esplicito.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Tenere traccia delle proprietà | proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>le proprietà per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>Controlla per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo viene associato al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>le proprietà per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>controlli del controllo di avanzamento.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando una traccia viene utilizzata per scorrere il contenuto, le dimensioni del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controllo è proporzionale alla percentuale del contenuto che viene visualizzato nell'area visualizzabile o viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente viene illustrato un esempio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controllo che implementa un controllo di traccia.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Una barra di scorrimento che include un controllo di traccia**![di ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "di ScrollBar") il calcolo seguente viene utilizzato per calcolare le dimensioni di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Percorso = trackLength × (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) il parametro viewportSize rappresenta il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: I parametri minimi e massimi corrispondono al <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>i valori delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Il valore dell'espressione massimo, minimo + viewportSize è la dimensione del contenuto scorrevole.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>proprietà rappresenta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>della traccia di quando il contenuto scorre verso il basso.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>valore non è uguale alla lunghezza o l'estensione del contenuto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una spiegazione più dettagliata, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>di una traccia in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>Aumenta dall'alto verso il basso o da sinistra a destra in base all'orientamento di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Analogamente, la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>di una traccia in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>aumenta dal basso verso l'alto o da sinistra a destra in base all'orientamento di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare la direzione dei valori crescenti, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>proprietà della traccia per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea il layout per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'area che viene fornito per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> da utilizzare per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> contenuto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> che diminuisce il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>proprietà del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo è in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>(controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>dei controlli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>associare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> che riduce la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> controllare quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> viene premuto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> controllo che ha le impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento figlio di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Specificare gli elementi figlio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio vengono indicizzati nell'ordine in cui vengono impostate le proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: Indice dell'elemento figlio.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nell'elenco di elementi figlio visivi.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: L'indice deve essere un numero compreso tra zero (0) e il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>proprietà meno uno (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: L'indice specificato è maggiore del valore del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>proprietà meno uno (1).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> che aumenta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>proprietà del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> classe</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo è in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>(controllo), il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>le proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>dei controlli del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>associare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> che aumenta la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> controllare quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> viene premuto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> controllo che ha le impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta se la direzione crescente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>è invertito rispetto alla direzione predefinita.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore di IsDirectionReversed è impostato su `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>posizioni di exchange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>i valori aumentano da sinistra a destra per entrambi orizzontale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>valori per un oggetto verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>aumentano dall'alto verso il basso, mentre per un oggetto verticale <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>aumentano di questi valori dal basso verso l'alto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà IsDirectionReversed su `true`, inverte la direzione dell'aumento del valore.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo e si imposta in modo esplicito la proprietà IsDirectionReversed, associa la proprietà IsDirectionReversed il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <> </> *> e <> </> *> posizioni scambiate e la direzione dei valori crescenti è invertito; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il numero massimo consentito <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo si trova in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>controllo e la proprietà del valore massimo non è impostata in modo esplicito, questa proprietà viene associata automaticamente con il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Il valore massimo per un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo equivale alla dimensione del contenuto scorrevole meno le dimensioni dell'area di contenuto visibile o viewport.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se le dimensioni del contenuto sono 100 e la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>proprietà è 30, il valore della proprietà numero massimo è 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Ciò avviene perché il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo corrisponde alla posizione del contenuto scorrevole che viene visualizzato nella parte superiore del riquadro di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Quando il contenuto scorre verso il basso molto in questo esempio, il 30% del contenuto viene ancora visualizzato nel riquadro di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>che corrisponde alla parte superiore del riquadro di visualizzazione è impostato su 70 e il valore massimo è impostato su 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente come <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>corrisponde a una posizione nel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo e si imposta non esplicitamente la proprietà di orientamento, l'orientamento della proprietà viene associata a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo e si imposta non esplicitamente la proprietà di orientamento, l'orientamento della proprietà viene associata a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> come determinato dalla posizione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The Value represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Il valore rappresenta un valore compreso tra il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>i valori delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Value property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo fa parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>controllo e il valore di proprietà non è impostata in modo esplicito, questa proprietà viene associata automaticamente con il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Calcola la modifica di <> </> *> del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> quando il <> </> *> sposta.

trans-unit.target: Spostamento orizzontale di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.target: La modifica in <> </> *> che corrisponde allo spostamento del <> </> *> del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Calcola la distanza tra il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> al punto specificato lungo il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: Il punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: La distanza tra il e il valore specificato pt valore.

trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la dimensione della parte del contenuto scorrevole che è visibile.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà ViewportSize viene utilizzato per calcolare la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controllo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>quando il ViewportSize non è <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la sezione Osservazioni per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per definire in modo esplicito la dimensione del <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>creare un oggetto che deriva dalla <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>classe e fornisce sostituzioni per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se si implementa un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>come parte di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>controllo e si imposta in modo esplicito la proprietà ViewportSize, associa la proprietà ViewportSize il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà ViewportSize un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>controllo che viene implementato in una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>controllo è sempre <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, in quanto il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>controllo non modifica la dimensione.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`||

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni dell'area visibile del contenuto scorrevole.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, il che significa che le dimensioni del contenuto non sono definita.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di elementi figlio di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Specificare gli elementi figlio di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>impostando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi figlio vengono indicizzati nell'ordine in cui vengono impostate le proprietà.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un numero intero compreso tra 0 e 2 che specifica il numero di elementi figlio di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
